content:
Craft an item of type: glowstone
inventory=[{"type": "green_carpet", "quantity": 19, "index": 12}, {"type": "purple_carpet", "quantity": 58, "index": 16}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 17}, {"type": "lectern", "quantity": 9, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 24}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence", "quantity": 51, "index": 34}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft glowstone, I need to place 4 glowstone_dust in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. The first glowstone_dust is currently in slot 26, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: glowstone
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "green_carpet", "quantity": 19, "index": 12}, {"type": "purple_carpet", "quantity": 58, "index": 16}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 17}, {"type": "lectern", "quantity": 9, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 24}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence", "quantity": 51, "index": 34}, {"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 38}]
thought: I have placed one glowstone_dust in the crafting grid. I need to place another one next to it, so I will move the glowstone_dust from slot 26 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
